name: Irrlicht Static Mesh File
summary: Learn about .IRRMESH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create an .IRRMESH file in Ambiera CopperCube, select the mesh of your object, select File → Export → Save selection as Irrlicht Mesh..., name your file, choose the save location, and click Save.
NOTE: Mesh files like IRRMESH are used to create the shape of objects in 3D engines, which render the objects for gameplay.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
